name: The Definitive Buyer's guide
description:
The Definitive Buyer's Guide is an arcade game  in which players attend to an intergalactic auction  to acquire and resell goods and make a fortune. To do so, player's will need to consult  the Definitive Buyer's Guide, a book that states the real value of everything.

Read the guide, pledge, and be fast: many want those pieces of intergalactic junk!

Made for the 2018 EpicMegaJam by WWUVbynight:

Andrea Bigatti
Davide Grimani
Lorenzo Rizzoni
Luca Imbriani
